summary: TestWorkflowEnvironment should support connecting to already-running servers instead of always spawning new ones, allowing developers to run integration tests against persistent servers with UI and history.
userImpact: Developers cannot easily run integration tests against existing servers, limiting their ability to leverage UI features and maintain test run history during development.
proposedFix: Support instantiation from a Connection object and use the same connection for both client and worker to avoid translating between NativeConnection and pure JS Connection classes.
keyQuote: We should support instantiation from a `Connection`. I would rather also have the worker be powered by the same connection to avoid translating between the objects
